      • saveCurrentBookshelfAction

        public java.lang.String saveCurrentBookshelfAction()
        Updates the currently selected Bookshelf if it already in the user's bookshelf list, adds it to the list otherwise. Saves DataManager in both cases.
        Throws:
        DAOException
